patthana15.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:2.1_1: Nahetuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:2.1_2: Hetuṁ kusalañca nahetuṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
patthana15.1:3.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.1:5.1_0: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.1:6.1_0: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:7.1_0: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:8.1_0: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:10.1_0: Hetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:12.1_0: Hetuṁ akusalañca nahetuṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.1:14.1_0: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.1:15.1_0: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:16.1_0: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:17.1_0: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana15.1:19.1_0: Nahetuṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
